mapper.insert: insert into df_user_member ( customer_id,mobilephone,idcard,birthplace,born_province,born_city,birthday,sex,regist_storeid, regist_cityno,regist_time,opencard_time,isnew_member,member_type,associator_level,associator_expiry_date, inviteCode ) values ( #{customer_id},#{mobilephone},#{idcard},#{birthplace},#{born_province},#{born_city},#{birthday},#{sex},#{regist_storeid}, #{regist_cityno},#{regist_time},#{opencard_time},#{isnew_member},#{member_type},#{associator_level},#{associator_expiry_date}, #{inviteCode} ) on duplicate key update opencard_time = values(opencard_time), associator_expiry_date = values(associator_expiry_date), member_type = values(member_type), update_time = now()

insert into df_user_try_member ( customer_id,mobilephone,idcard,birthplace,born_province,born_city,birthday,sex,regist_storeid, regist_cityno,regist_time,opencard_time,isnew_member,member_type,associator_level,associator_expiry_date, inviteCode ) values ( #{customer_id},#{mobilephone},#{idcard},#{birthplace},#{born_province},#{born_city},#{birthday},#{sex},#{regist_storeid}, #{regist_cityno},#{regist_time},#{opencard_time},#{isnew_member},#{member_type},#{associator_level},#{associator_expiry_date}, #{inviteCode} ) on duplicate key update opencard_time = values(opencard_time), associator_expiry_date = values(associator_expiry_date), member_type = values(member_type), update_time = now()
mapper.update: update df_user_member set inviteCode = #{inviteCode} where customer_id = #{customer_id}
